summary: The diff shows backend/main.mo was modified to add the unifiedLegsLibrary array and useUnifiedLegs toggle. However, the diff is truncated so we cannot fully verify all 17 exercises, their demoUrls, primaryMuscleGroup values, recoveryTime values, or the presence of the useUnifiedLegs toggle. The beginning of the exerciseLibrary is visible and appears unchanged. Partial evidence supports REQ-9 and REQ-10 but cannot be fully confirmed due to truncation.

missing_requirements.requirement: The unifiedLegsLibrary array must contain exactly 17 exercises, all with primaryMuscleGroup = Legs and recoveryTime = 72, with correct muscleandstrength.com demoUrls.

missing_requirements.requirement: The variable let useUnifiedLegs = false; must be declared after the unifiedLegsLibrary array.
